ValidationRule.description: Ensure that if Attendance_Status__c is "Partial Day," both Absence_Category__c and Compensation__c must be specified:
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Attendance_Status__c, "Partial Day"), OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Absence_Category__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT(Compensation__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you set Attendance Status is "Partial Day" you have to specify both Absence Category and Compensation.
